Question: Deter mosquitoes from camp fire.
Choices: (A) Burn sage in the fire. (B) Burn twigs in the fire.
Mosquitoes are attracted to the carbon dioxide emitted from humans and animals. Burning sage in the fire will produce a smoke that will help to mask the carbon dioxide emitted from the campers.
Burning sage or twigs in a campfire can help create smoke that can repel mosquitoes, as mosquitoes are attracted to the light and heat of the fire.
